item.name: Invoices
item.description: fabric **Invoices** API helps in generating invoices that can be used by any third party system for order fulfillment operation.

description.content: When an order is created or processed, fabric generates invoice and sends it to merchants or third-party systems for further financial processing of the order. This endpoint lets merchants acknowledge that they have received the invoice with payment information.
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
